name: Dread Ghoul ILW project
description:
In the city far away, a mad scientist named Dimitrov Kranksmann.

Dimitrov was overqualified for his research and he had some bad ideas for the experiment. He wants to create a supernatural race in the world in order to surpass the humanity. One day the scientist wanted to make his dream come true, so he started to create some creatures then he was fired from the laboratory. A few months later, he continued his research in a disused laboratory which has named the BlyatLab, and started to create his first demon, dread ghoul.

But dread ghoul was a failure for the mad scientist, because he doesn’t have the same intention as Dimitrov, so the mad man kicked him from the BlyatLab. Dread Ghoul was desperate and started to try to save people and animals in needs because he was traumatised by the scientist and the experiment.

The scientist Kranksmann, tried to make a better demon, but all the demons were doomed to death.

One day, the scientist opened a door from a parallel universe and The Lord Gora appeared to take the control of the humanity. The scientist tried to make an alliance with Lord Gora but, failed and died.

Lord Gora is a terrifying black gorilla, he has a Mithril armor, in fact, he is a warrior. He wants to be the king of the entire galaxy, so he made himself a crown. His axe named Rage is in gold to show the worlds his wealth just before killing them all.

Lord Gora is very strong, he can jump super high, his crown gives him superpowers like telepathy, he controls animals. He has force field shield to protect him against all the elements and the weapons from the humans.

Lord Gora has one weakness, it’s from his crown, if someone manage to take it off, he loses his superpowers, but keeps his strength.
